properties.name: Babadag Mountain, Paragliding Take Off Site
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251Babadag Mountain, Turkey6000ft Babadag take off for paragliding and hangliding in southern Turkey. Grab a ride in a rusty old 4x4 from Olu Deniz and travel up the old forestry road, through mafia checkpoints to the top of the "Father Mountain". Great launch site for XC, SIV or just a quiet flight down to the beach at Olu Deniz for a drink!

properties.name: Base for South Africa Exploration and Flying!
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251JohannesburgHope to get some good flying in while down in SA.

properties.name: Good Flying and Diving
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251 Cape TownLooking forward to some great flying down here.

properties.name: Kimberley Alpine Resorts
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251Kimberley Ski HillThe quietest ski resort in the world! No lift ques and runs all to yourself, awesome! Loads of great slopes and great for race training too.

properties.name: Lady McDonald Peak Launch Site
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251Lady McDonald Peak, Paragliding Launch, Canadian Rocky MountainsParagliding launch site above Canmore in the Canadian Rocky Mountains.

properties.name: Paragliding Competition
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251Hedley, BC, CanadaParagliding competition in Hedley, first week in May. Also includes the worlds first disabled fliers competition, bring it on!

properties.name: Paragliding Landing Site on Olu Deniz Beach
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251  Olu Deniz, TurkeyAmazing beach in Turkey, take off from the Babadag mountain inland, fly out over the sea and blue lagoon, land on the beach! Great views over the Turkish coast, and awesome flying conditions.

properties.name: Rocky Mountain Apartment
properties.description: Posted by Andyc251Apartment at Canmore CrossingAmazing apartment in an amazing location! Im staying here for april when i have finished training in Kimberley, skiing at Lake Louise, Sunshine Mountain and Kicking Horse. Paragliding from Golden and Canmore.
